casebody.data:
GLOBE WERNICKE COMPANY, Appellant, v. RECONSTRUCTION FINANCE CORPORATION, Appellee. No. 8892. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Feb. 9, 1942. Kunkel & Kunkel, of Cincinnati, Ohio, for appellant. L. L. Towell, Clan Crawford, and Squire, Sanders & Dempsey, all of Cleveland, Ohio, and James M. DeCamp, of Cincinnati, Ohio, for appellee.

Before HICKS, HAMILTON, and McALLISTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This cause was heard upon the transcript of record, the briefs and arguments of counsel. In consideration whereof, it is ordered and adjudged that the judgment appealed from be and the same is affirmed upon the grounds and for the reasons set forth in the opinion of the District Court filed December 14, 1940, 35 F.Supp. 909.
